thread.title: Hawks' Uthoff is a preseason All-Big Ten Choice
thread.title_full: Hawks' Uthoff is a preseason All-Big Ten Choice

author: Rick Coleman
title: Hawks' Uthoff is a preseason All-Big Ten Choice
text:
Hawks' Uthoff is a preseason All-Big Ten Choice - KWWL - Eastern Iowa Breaking News, Weather, Closings Member Center: Hawks' Uthoff is a preseason All-Big Ten Choice Posted: Hawkeyes The latest news and information on the University of Iowa Hawkeyes sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball, softball and more. More >> 
Iowa senior forward Jarrod Uthoff is one of 10 men’s basketball players selected to the 2015 Preseason All-Big Ten team as selected by a media voting panel. Uthoff (6-foot-9, 220 pounds) was a third-team all-conference and first-team academic all-district honoree a year ago, helping the Hawkeyes to a third place Big Ten finish and to the third round of the NCAA Tournament. Uthoff ranked second on the team in scoring (12.4 ppg.), rebounding (6.4 rpg.), steals (1.1 spg.), and blocked shots (1.6), and first in 3-pointers made (54) as a junior. The Cedar Rapids, Iowa, native was the only Division I player to amass 55+ blocks, 50+ 3-pointers, and 35+ steals.
